title: Waterfall的使用时......
author: 命令方块1
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2020-3-7 01:05 编辑 

Win7系统，在使用waterfall-323时出现了[19:37:36] [main/INFO]: Using standard Java JCE cipher.
[19:37:36] [main/INFO]: Using standard Java compressor.
[19:37:36] [main/INFO]: Enabled Waterfall version git:Waterfall-Bootstrap:1.15-SNAPSHOT:8f74df2:323
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]: Exception in thread "main" java.lang.IllegalStateException: failed to create a child event loop
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.util.concurrent.MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.<init>(MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.java:88)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.util.concurrent.MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.<init>(MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.java:58)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.util.concurrent.MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.<init>(MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.java:47)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.MultithreadEventLoopGroup.<init>(MultithreadEventLoopGroup.java:59)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoopGroup.<init>(NioEventLoopGroup.java:86)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoopGroup.<init>(NioEventLoopGroup.java:81)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoopGroup.<init>(NioEventLoopGroup.java:68)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at net.md_5.bungee.netty.PipelineUtils.newEventLoopGroup(PipelineUtils.java:140)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeCord.start(BungeeCord.java:260)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at net.md_5.bungee.BungeeCordLauncher.main(BungeeCordLauncher.java:62)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at net.md_5.bungee.Bootstrap.main(Bootstrap.java:15)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]: Caused by: io.netty.channel.ChannelException: failed to open a new selector
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.openSelector(NioEventLoop.java:175)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.<init>(NioEventLoop.java:142)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoopGroup.newChild(NioEventLoopGroup.java:146)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoopGroup.newChild(NioEventLoopGroup.java:37)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.util.concurrent.MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.<init>(MultithreadEventExecutorGroup.java:84)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         ... 10 more
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]: Caused by: java.io.IOException: Unable to establish loopback connection
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer.run(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.SelectorProviderImpl.openPipe(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at java.nio.channels.Pipe.open(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorImpl.<init>(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.WindowsSelectorProvider.openSelector(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at io.netty.channel.nio.NioEventLoop.openSelector(NioEventLoop.java:173)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         ... 14 more
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]: Caused by: java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect0(Native Method)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.Net.connect(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.SocketChannelImpl.connect(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at java.nio.channels.SocketChannel.open(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         at sun.nio.ch.PipeImpl$Initializer$LoopbackConnector.run(Unknown Source)
[19:37:49] [main/ERROR]:         ... 23 more
复制代码大佬帮忙看一下

自行解决 更换Waterfall核心版本到waterfall-280后解决

replies.author: DE_SHARK
replies.txt_content: 建议使用BungeeCore，waterfall 的兼容性较差。

replies.author: 江清月近
replies.txt_content: 配置文件有没有改中文服务器名

replies.author: 命令方块1
replies.txt_content:
江清月近 发表于 2020-2-24 23:52
配置文件有没有改中文服务器名
没有，这是第一次启动
